headline: Bridgewater reveals its top buys and sells of Q1 in latest filing
summary: A new filing from Ray Dalio's Bridgewater Associates shows the stocks the firm bought and sold during the first quarter. Among the top stocks bought are Alibaba (BABA), Baidu (BIDU), the SPDR Gold ETF (GLD), Palo Alto Networks (PANW), and Booking (BKNG). On the other side, the firm sold stakes in Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL), Nvidia (NVDA), Meta Platforms (META), AppLovin (APP), and SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.
